alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 3:09PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern West Feliciana, northwestern St. Helena, East Feliciana and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes, southeastern Wilkinson and Amite Counties through 415 PM CST... At 308 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Spillman to near Slaughter. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Baker, Jackson, Clinton, Liberty, Centreville, Woodville, Slaughter, Gloster, Wilson, Norwood, Spillman, Darlington, Felps, Gillsburg, Easleyville and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall and frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building or vehicle.
